announcements.name: SkyBlock Patch 0.18.3
announcements.description: Hey Everyone! Today's Patch includes quite a lot of different things, including (but not limited to): The Long Awaited Crop Growth Changes (tm), Garden Preset Changes, Bazaar Additions New Sacks and Updates to old Sacks

announcements.name: SkyBlock Patch March 24 - Various Grammatical Fixes
announcements.description: We are here to inform you about the latest update that was just rolled to SkyBlock! This update focuses on correcting some grammar mistakes in different areas in the game
